pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, June 8, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, June 8, 2017:

Charlevoix, Quebec

9:25 a.m. The Prime Minister will be greeted by the Mayor of La Malbaie, Michel Couturier, at La Malbaie City Hall.

515 De Comport√© Boulevard
La Malbaie, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity for arrival
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:45 a.m.

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion with business and tourism representatives and elected officials from the Charlevoix region.

Le Charlevoix room
Fairmont Le Manoir Richelieu
181 Richelieu Street
La Malbaie, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:15 a.m.

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Terrace
Fairmont Le Manoir Richelieu
181 Richelieu Street
La Malbaie, Quebec

Notes for media :

  • Open coverage
  • Media must arrive no later than 9:15 a.m.
